name: NRG x UFC GYM Varsity Hoodie
description: NRG and UFC Gyms have come together and created the ultimate gaming and mixed martial arts apparel collection comfortable enough for you to Train Different on the server or the Octagon!
Charcoal long sleeve pullover hoodie with Energy Property Of graphics printed on front.
details: Vintage varsity-style logo in this throwback look
Relaxed fit silhouette that is roomy throughout
note: Each order of NRG x UFC gear includes 1 free month of membership to UFC Gym.

name: NRG Fundamentals Crewneck Sweater
description: Cream sweater with the NRG logo embroidered on front.
details: 13.5oz./yd² (US) 22.5 oz./L yd (CA), 70/30 cotton/polyester, 100% cotton face yarns on solid colors
20 singles face yarn for a durable and textured fabric face
Double ribbing side panels for stretch
Reverse coverstitch sewing on all seams for durability and a premium finish
Body panels sewn cross grain to limit shrinkage & shortening after wash
520gm 100% cotton 1x1 ribbing at cuff and waistband

Back pocket & Jersey lined hand pockets
Relaxed fit with tapered knee opening

name: NRG Keycaps
description: Limited edition custom designed NRG keycap set. Choose from a variety of custom NRG-logo keycaps to create a signature look to upgrade your existing keyboard.
details: Designed for 60%, tenkeyless, full-size 104 keyboards, and everything in between
Compatible with Cherry MX Switches and any other switches of the same design
Set includes 7 special keys to accommodate variants of keyboard layout including 7U long spacebar key x 1, 1.5U keys x 4 and 1U keys x 2
Premium PBT plastic and all side dye-sublimation legends for great feel, great sound, and lasting quality
Popular cherry profile for a stellar look

name: NRG Skull Skateboard
